resources.string: Viola Davis is an actress known for her award-winning performances in the TV series \'How to Get Away With Murder,\' the Broadway productions of \'King Hedley II\' and \'Fences\' and its film adaptation. After attending the Juilliard School of Performing Arts, Davis made her Broadway debut in 1996 in Seven Guitars. She has won Tony Awards for her performances in King Hedley II (2001) and a revival of August Wilson\'s Fences (2010), which co-starred Denzel Washington.
